comment.author: 41716940@N08
comment._content: What type of tractor is that?

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 41716940@N08
comment._content: Emerson brantingham big four prairie tractor. There is only 3 left in Australia , 1 in Mudgee, 1 in Parkes. 1 in Victoria owned by Norm Johnston and it is the best one.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 41716940@N08
comment._content: I have a friend who is a walking encyclopaedia on old tractors.
